StationType.name: Commonwealth station
StationType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthCustoms, friendly, human, majorStation, primary, populated

StationType.name: armed Commonwealth station
StationType.attributes: commonwealth, commonwealthCustoms, fleetDelivery, friendly, human, majorStation, primary, populated

Default.desc: You are in a large and crowded spacer bar.

Story.OnPaneInit:
(block (allEnemies bestStation bestLevel bestMessage allStories scanStation) ; Define list of stations that we know about (setq allStories '( (1 &stCentauriOccupation; 10 'scan) (2 &stOutlawBase; 11 Nil) (3 &stKorolovShipping; 21 'scan) (4 &stHotel; 24 'scan) (5 &stTerroristCamp; 30 'scan) (6 &stBlackMarketStation; 31 'scan) (7 &stDrugCartelOutpost; 40 Nil) (8 &stSungSlaveCamp; 41 Nil) (9 &stPenitentShrine; 50 Nil) (10 &stXenophobeFleet; 60 Nil) (11 &stTempusLab; 23 'scan) (12 &stMiningColony; 20 'scan) (13 &stAbbasidOutpost; 22 'scan) ))
; Find the best station to tell a story about (setq bestLevel 0) (setq bestMessage 0) (setq scanStation Nil)
; Look for enemy station in the system (setq allEnemies (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "tAM")) (enum allEnemies station (block (type) (setq type (objGetType station))
; Figure out if there is a story for this station (enum allStories story (if (eq (item story 1) type) (if (gr (item story 2) bestLevel) (block Nil (setq bestStation station) (setq bestLevel (item story 2)) (setq bestMessage (item story 0)) (setq scanStation (item story 3)) ) ) ) ) ) )
; Scan the station (if (and scanStation bestStation) (objSetKnown bestStation) )
; Tell the story (scrSetDesc gScreen (switch (eq bestMessage 0) "You spend 5 credits on drinks; everyone else around you seems to be having a good time."
(eq bestMessage 1) (cat "You listen to a refugee from " (objGetName bestStation) ": \"Centauri warlords took over our station last month. Whatever—I like this place better.\" You spend 5 credits and buy him a few drinks.")
(eq bestMessage 2) "You spend 5 credits on drinks. A young stationer next to you comments that its a lot easier to get laudanum now that the Outlaw base is in the system."
(eq bestMessage 3) (block (xp) (setq rank (typGetGlobalData &stKorolovShipping; "xp")) (switch (or (not rank) (eq rank 0)) "You spend 5 credits on drinks. You talk to a couple of freighter pilots who try to convince you to fly escort missions for Korolov Shipping."
(ls rank 0) "A group of freighter pilots point in your direction, talking about how you blew your escort mission. You settle up a 5 credit tab and get ready to leave."
"A group of freighter pilots welcome you into their group. You tell various stories about your run-ins with the Charon pirates, but in the end you still get stuck with the 5 credit tab." ) )
(eq bestMessage 4) (cat "You talk to a corporate woman staying at the " (objGetName bestStation) ". She drones on about the excellent service. You spend 5 credits on drinks.")
(eq bestMessage 5) "You spend 5 credits and listen to a nuclear technician: \"I just got paid ten kilocreds to install a radiation room at the Sapiens camp! Those flippers scare me—with all their talk about 'human purity' they seem a little short on the brain scale.\""
(eq bestMessage 6) "A woman dressed in a fancy neolinen suit talks to you: \"Do you know how to get a contact at the black market station? You look like you might know.\" You spend 5 credits on drinks."
(eq bestMessage 7) "An old man talks to you: \"I don't trust the corporate medlabs—they talk about drug shortages while they munch on oncokillers and antigens! I'm going to the Death Labs—what's the worst they can do? Kill me?\" You spend 5 credits to buy him a drink."
(eq bestMessage 8) "You spend 5 credits while listening to a drunk woman: \"My sister-in-law was abducted by those filthy Sung. We finally got her released by buying her contract. I can't believe they allow slavery to exist. Hey, can you buy me a drink?\""
(eq bestMessage 9) "You drink through 5 credits while talking to an attractive Sister: \"The Sisters of Domina believe in the power of transcendence, but we worship Domina because she brings life and beauty. Say, you're not a Penitent, are you? Good! The Penitents only care about power and death—Oracus controls them, you know.\""
(eq bestMessage 10) "You spend 5 credits buying drinks for a mercenary. He talk about his encounters with the Xenophobes: \"The minute I see their green ships I turn tail—I'm not proud. And you shouldn't be either!\""
(eq bestMessage 11) "A man dressed in an expensive suit talks to you: \"You look like you need some Tempus.\" You ignore him and spend 5 credits buying your own drinks."
(eq bestMessage 12) (cat "You talk to a group of miners from " (objGetName bestStation) " who try to impress you with their knowledge of helium regolith market prices. You spend 5 credits on drinks.")
(eq bestMessage 13) "A woman weeps softly as she tells her story: \"Our freighter strayed near an Abbasid outpost by mistake. They had no mercy—they just kept firing on us—the captain begged them to stop, but the blasts kept coming! Then our cabin got hit and my husband...\" She stares into space and says no more. You leave 5 credits for her drinks."
"You spend 5 credits, but the drinks are weak." ) ) )

NoMoney.desc: You hang around for a while, but you have no money to buy drinks.

Default.OnPaneInit: (scrSetDesc gScreen "You are in a large dance club where women and men dressed in leather and latex dance to classical music. " "A short, wide man in a long suit and an iron collar approaches you:\n\n" "\"I'm told that you are a %man% who can sell me what I need.\"" )

Action.name: "I can sell you whatever you want."

Actions.Action:
(block Nil ; Navigate to DealComplete so that we return here when sell ; screen exits.
(setq gResult 0) (scrShowPane gScreen "DealComplete")
; Show sell screen
(scrShowSellScreen (lambda (theItem) (switch (itmMatches theItem "*NU +Illegal; -ID; <=#25;") (divide (multiply 150 (itmGetPrice theItem 'credit)) 100)
Nil ) )
Nil ; obsolete
'( "The Victorian Nightclub" 10000 ) ) )

Action.name: "I have no idea what you're talking about."

Nothing.desc: You are in a large dance club where women and men dressed in leather and latex dance to classical music. Almost everyone here has the doe-eyed look common to those with an impaired nervous system. The heat and noise are oppressive and you choose not to stay long.

DeliveryMission.desc: You are in a large dance club where women and men dressed in leather and lace dance to classical music. A nondescript man dances next to you and whispers, "I hope you have what I need."

Actions.Action: (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itBlackMarketContainer; 1)) (objSetData gPlayerShip "blackMarketMission" Nil) (objIncData gPlayerShip "blackMarketXP" 150) (scrShowPane gScreen "DeliveryComplete") )

Action.name: "I have no idea what you're talking about."

DeliveryComplete.desc: The nondescript man follows you to your cargo hold and takes the sealed container. He smiles as he leaves, "Say hello to Aubrey for me!"

Default.desc: You are in the outer docking level of a large station of the Commonwealth. A monorail terminal provides access to various points around the station.

DefaultWithInfo.desc: You are in the outer docking level of a large station of the Commonwealth. A monorail terminal provides access to various points around the station.

CommoditiesExchange.OnPaneInit: (scrSetDesc gScreen (cat "Welcome to the " (objGetName gSource) " Commodities Exchange Market."))

Actions.Action:
(scrShowBuyScreen "* -Illegal" ; items sold to player Nil ; obsolete
'( "d" ; install devices 6 ; of level 6 (and below) Nil ; no special tech modifiers True ; check for military ID 0) ; install cost margin )
(block Nil (setq gTechLevel 7) (setq gArmorSegment 0) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsRepairArmor;") )
(block Nil (setq gTechLevel 6) (setq gTechModifier Nil) (setq gCheckMilitaryID True) (setq gMargin 100) (scrShowScreen gScreen "&dsInstallDevice;") )

CentralPlaza.desc: You are in the central hub of this station, a busy area where trendy shops mix with high-end residences.
